00023 namespace surfit {
00024 
00025 class vec;
00026 class intvec;
00027 
00031 class SURFIT_EXPORT binman {
00032 public:
00033         binman() {};
00034         virtual ~binman();
00035 };
00036 
00040 class SURFIT_EXPORT modifier1 {
00041 public:
00043         virtual vec * get_weights() const = 0;
00045         virtual intvec * get_weights_cnt() const = 0;
00047         virtual void remove_weights() = 0;
00049         virtual void remove_weights_cnt() = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00055 class SURFIT_EXPORT user {
00056 public:
00057 
00059         user(const char * iname);
00060 
00062         ~user();
00063         
00065         void setName(const char * newname);
00066 
00068         const char * getName() const;
00069 
00071         virtual int max_priority() = 0;
00072 
00074         virtual void init() = 0;
00075 
00077         virtual void prepare() = 0;
00078 
00080         virtual void begin() = 0;
00081 
00083         virtual void stage1(int priority) = 0;
00085         virtual void stage2(int priority) = 0;
00087         virtual void stage3(int priority) = 0;
00089         virtual void stage4(int priority) = 0;
00091         virtual void stage5(int priority) = 0;
00093         virtual void finish() = 0;
00094 
00096         virtual void release() = 0;
00097 
00098 protected:
00099 
00101         char * name;
00102 
00103 };
00104 
00105 }; // namespace surfit;
